definition: sorrow/grief/pity/to grieve for/to pity/to lament/to condole
Ai (c. 2000 BC), sixth of legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God, also known as Li 釐|厘[Li2]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to grieve over sb's death/to lament sb's death/mourning
to observe a moment of silence in tribute
four types of human emotions, namely: happiness 歡喜|欢喜[huan1 xi3], anger 憤怒|愤怒[fen4 nu4], sorrow 悲哀[bei1 ai1] and joy 快樂|快乐[kuai4 le4]
to cry piteously/anguished wailing/same as 哀嚎

sentences.english: The fluffy, peachy -beige breast feather immediately suggested a mourning dove.
sentences.chinese: 这种毛茸茸的杏黄色胸羽马上让人想到了哀鸠。

sentences.english: Gears whine as turrets traverse, zeroing in on the lead elements.
sentences.chinese: 齿轮哀炮塔作为导线，在零对铅元素。

sentences.english: In spite of this marriage, however, it was said that Charles Myriel created a great deal of talk.
sentences.chinese: 米里哀先生虽已结婚，据说仍常常惹起别人的谈论。

sentences.english: We were awakened by the whimpers of the sick puppy.
sentences.chinese: 生病小狗的哀叫声将我们吵醒了。

sentences.english: Escaping through the window, it is taken by the police, and forcibly returned home Monsignor Myriel.
sentences.chinese: 从窗户逃离，它是由警察，强行回家主教米里哀。

sentences.english: Very few families had been acquainted with the Myriel family before the Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 很少人知道米里哀这家人在革命以前的情况。

sentences.english: M. Charles Myriel emigrated to Italy at the very beginning of the Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 米里哀先生，当革命刚开始时便出亡到意大利。

sentences.english: The herd had been badly frightened and their restless crying went on for hours.
sentences.chinese: 牛群都被吓坏了，恐惧的哀叫声持续了几个小时。

sentences.english: The gentleman is in mourning and gone. love will a man alone, male?
sentences.chinese: 是以昔之君子皆哀而恕之，雄独非人子乎？

sentences.english: M. Myriel was one of the ninety-five bishops who attended it.
sentences.chinese: 九十五个主教参加了会议，米里哀先生是其中之一。

sentences.english: The dog whimpered in the corner.

sentences.chinese: 以上就是米里哀先生的预算表。

definition: to sigh in regret or pity/Taiwan pr. [wan4]
